```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(matrixStats)
library(partitions)
library(tictoc)
library(LaplacesDemon)

source(here("helper/make_scheme_and_params.R"))
source(here("helper/initialization.R"))
source(here("helper/probability_computations.R"))
source(here("helper/main_simulation_helper.R"))

d <- read_csv(here("data/processed_rt_task_data.csv"))

# set up multicore sims
future::plan(multicore)
```

Figuring out the sequence and generate the stimuli sequence with all the parameters 

```{r}

# set model-related parameters 
alpha_epsilons = c(1)
beta_epsilons = c(10)
alpha_priors = c(1)
beta_priors = c(1)
noise_parameters = c(0)
world_EIGs = c(0.001)
max_observation = 100

model_params <- set_model_params(alpha_priors, beta_priors, 
                alpha_epsilons, beta_epsilons, 
                noise_parameters, world_EIGs, max_observation)


# set stimuli-related parameters 
features_df <- tibble(
  n_features = c(1, 3, 5), 
  on_features_n = c(1, 3, 5)
)
sequence_scheme = c("BDBBBB", "BBBDBB", "BBBBBD", "BBBBBB")

stims_df <- set_stim_params(sequence_scheme, features_df)


full_params_df <- make_simulation_params(n_sim = 50,
                                        model_params, 
                                        stims_df)


```



Running the simulation. 

```{r}
tic()
all_sims_res <- full_params_df %>%
  mutate(row_number = row_number()) %>% 
  group_by(row_number) %>% 
  nest() %>%
  mutate(results = map(data,
                       function(df) main_simulation(params = df))) %>%
  unnest(cols = c(data, results))
toc()
```

Clean and visualize. 

```{r}
complete_sim_res <- all_sims_res %>% 
  group_by(params_id, sim_id, sub_id, stimulus_idx) %>% 
  summarise(sample_n = n()) %>% 
  filter(!is.na(stimulus_idx)) %>% 
  left_join(full_params_df %>% select(-n), 
            by = c("params_id", "sim_id")) %>% 
  mutate(prior_info = paste("a", alpha_prior, "b", beta_prior, sep = "_")) %>% 
  mutate(eig_info = paste("np", noise_parameter, "ee", world_EIG))

ggplot(complete_sim_res, 
       aes(x = stimulus_idx, y = sample_n)) + 
  geom_line(alpha = .1, aes(group = sub_id.x)) + 
  stat_summary(fun.data = "mean_cl_boot", geom = "line", position = position_dodge(width = .1)) +
  facet_grid(alpha_prior~sequence_scheme)
```
